reviewText: it does not work in my car

The DVD has the Video for 'Talk' and a small behind-the-scenes video of the making of it. It also has two audio tracks: Talk - edit, and 'Gravity'.

However, Amazon have listed it incorrectly as being NTSC Region 1. It is in fact PAL format and region-free. So you can only watch it on computers, not on regular DVD players in North America.

I thought there is more on the dvd. This is poor...

The "Making of" Is not a Making Of. It is just a little blabla...
